Package CMP3\Data

Cross Media Publishing - CMP3

Interface summary

RowInterface Data provider class for a single record with iterator
RenderRecordInterface This generates from an DataRowMeta object a XmlRecord object

Class summary

Row {@inheritdoc}
Field This is a data container for one data field including the data itself but also some meta data.
Typo3Query Data query for a single table.
Record DOMDocument that stores a record as XML in CMP3 format
RenderRecord {@inheritdoc}
Document DOMDocument that stores a full CMP3 XML document
